name: Fire Tower
description:
Safe guard your tower from enemy invasion by supplying the crystal power to the Fire Gun.

Tower:

You have four drag-able power cores in the center of your Main Tower And there are multiple Fire Gun Towers around the Main Tower. You have to drag power core and put them on the Fire Gun Tower.

Only then Fire Gun Tower will work or safe guard your Main Tower from enemy invasion.

Crystals:

Tap on the crystals around map for mining. Then put the collected crystals in the Main Tower to give energy to power cores those are connected to Fire Gun Towers.

How To Play :

Left Click - Pick/Drag/Build.

Touch - Pick/Drag/Build.

What are you waiting for fire them all....
